steps.name: CypherCommand
commands:
with 4 as hexLength
match (o:esco__Occupation)

with distinct o, hexLength
with o, hexLength, '0x' + right( o.uri, hexLength) as baseHexCode
with o, hexLength, baseHexCode, toLower(apoc.text.hexValue( apoc.convert.toInteger(baseHexCode) + 1)) as replacementChars, left(right( o.uri, 36),36 - hexLength) as trimmedUri, 0 as zero
with o, replacementChars, trimmedUri + right (replacementChars,hexLength ) as newUri
create (al:OccupationLabel:Resource {skos__prefLabel: o.skos__prefLabel, uri: "<<contentapiprefix>>/occupationlabel/" + newUri})
create (o)-[:hasPrefLabel]->(al)
